name: Sea of Wonders
description:
Lucy Westernra is a bisexual poly icon and she deserved better. 

This is a visual novel retelling of Bram Stoker's Dracula , starting from the graveyard scene. Play as Lucy and choose which of your  very hot suitors you want to romance, or just try and survive all of them trying to kill you (rude). 

  • Quincy as a hot lesbian cowboy
  • Arthur being the rich himbo  of your dreams
  • Dr. Seward existing
  • Multiple Endings!
